metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23362 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The package hosted-git-info before 3.0.8 are vulnerable to RegularExpression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via regular expression shortcutMatchin the fromUrl function in index.js. The affected regular expressionexhibits polynomial worst-case time complexity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23362` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-hosted-git-info - 3.0.8-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-hosted-git-info package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.8-1').
